name: Gist v. Allentown Wholesale Distributors, Inc., Appellant
name_abbreviation: Gist v. Allentown Wholesale Distributors, Inc.

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and Eagen, JJ.
parties: Gist v. Allentown Wholesale Distributors, Inc., Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Woodring for the court en bane discharging the defendant’s motions for judgment n.o.v. and a new trial.
Judgment affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Martin A. Kutler, with him Joseph Gf. Hildenberger, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Gist v. Allentown Wholesale Distributors, Inc., Appellant.
Argued January 7, 1960.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and Eagen, JJ.
March 15, 1960:
Francis H. 8. Ede, for appellant.
Martin A. Kutler, with him Joseph Gf. Hildenberger, for appellee.
